module.name: Misc Destinations
module.description: Allows creating destinations that dial any local number (extensions, feature codes, outside phone numbers) that can be used by other modules (eg, IVR, time conditions) as a call destination.
module.changelog: *13.0.5* FREEPBX-12690 add view for destinations usage *13.0.4.1* FREEPBX-14524 Setting a dial string with a leading space for Misc Destination causes dial to fail *13.0.4* FREEPBX-12575 *13.0.3* FREEPBX-12386 fix labels, grid to bst and floating rnav *13.0.2* Version bump out of Beta
